title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project is not.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Navigator.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Note that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project is not.
